title: Nobel Laureate Rigoberta Menchú to Take Part in Three Events at U of A (University ...
text: ( Source : University of Arkansas ) Courtesy of PeaceJam Rigoberta Menchú . FAYETTEVILLE, Ark. - Rigoberta Menchú, who won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1992 and has been a life-long advocate for indigenous peoples in her native Guatemala and around
